name: BetterCache
author: kafeijao
description:
Simple mod that improves the Cache management and cleaning.

**__Features__**
- Deletes the files with older accessed date when above the limit
- Set a custom Cache Folder location (default: `ChilloutVR/Cache/`)
- Set a Max limit for the Cache (default: `20GB`)
- Buttons to clear cache
- Deletes original Cache Folders to prevent cluttering

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/BetterCache) for more in-depth info.
changelog: - Stop poking cohtml outside of main thread.
